techmeme.title: Alibaba creates an English language version of Modelscope, an Amazon Bedrock like service for building AI models launched in 2022, and claims to host 5K+ models (Simon Sharwood/The Register)
A Google DeepMind study of 200 observed incidents of misuse between January 2023 and March 2024 finds political deepfakes are the most common misuse of AI (Cristina Criddle/Financial Times)
Amazon plans to hold Prime Day 2024 on July 16 and July 17 in 24 countries including the US, the UK, and Japan; India will receive a separate event later (Quentyn Kennemer/The Verge)
Belgium-based TechWolf, which provides AI-powered internal talent management software, has raised a $42.75M Series B led by Felix Capital at a $150M valuation (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Sources: US is probing China Mobile, China Telecom, and China Unicom over concerns they are providing Americans' data to Beijing through their US cloud services (Alexandra Alper/Reuters)
